alert.note: Alert for Craig (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 5:33PM CDT until August 16 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Bluejacket, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bluejacket... Pyramid Corners... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 288 and 290. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
